TopicTitle: is there any mods which have spherical parts?

Articles.Content: the use of the parts does not really matter. thanks!

Hi zraxon, welcome to the community

I do seem to remember a part, it was a set of spherical fuel tanks, very old but might still work, I remember the word entatmos, I'll see if I can find it for you

Edit: My googlefu is weak, I can't find it, it was on the old add-on list at the kspwiki, but since the update it's not the same page anymore.

Edited August 30, 2012 by sal_vager
Good going there Bedazzled, this is indeed the model I remember, but not sure if it's the exact mod, also the RAR files seem corrupted, but the ZIP's seem okay

Good going there Bedazzled, this is indeed the model I remember, but not sure if it's the exact mod, also the RAR files seem corrupted, but the ZIP's seem okay

tyvm, but the zip file seems to be corrupted too. or am i not doing it right?

Oh it seems that they are all corrupted, I opened the zip but didn't check to see if the files contained inside were alright.

I guess that add-on is no more, you're best bet now would be to request an add-on maker make you new spherical parts, or have a go at making some of your own perhaps.
the deep space mission pack has a spherical command module...
The Lazor has a tiny sphere on it
Deep Space Mission pack has a spherical command pod, like 2001 Space odessy's Discovery
It'd be easy to make a sphere of just about any size into a mod. What do you want to do with it/have it look like?

I have a copy of Entamos. Unfortunately, the .zip is too large and I don't have a mediafire or Dropbox account. And I'm not even sure if it still works in .16.
